page.title: 07THE MOTORWAY
page.content: The M40 extension will run right through Otmoor. Otmoor is a home for lots of wildlife especially birds because a lot of Otmoor is wet and marshy which the birds like. The noise of the motorway will disturb the peace. The fumes from the cars might pollute the air and water,and poison the animals. The motorway will run through lots of peoples' land and even through some barns. The River Ray,which lots of people fish in,will have to be drained for the motorway,and will vanish completely. The workmen have already started draining Otmoor. The motorway will bring lots of commuters to live in Charlton-on-Otmoor and the surrounding villages.The motorway is being built make the journey to Birmingham from London shorter by 17 minutes!
